definition[0]: to make the sound of a letter, word etc, especially in the correct way
example[0]: How do you pronounce your name?
definition[1]: to officially state that something is true
example[1]: The victim was pronounced dead on arrival.
example[2]: I now pronounce you man and wife.
definition[2]: to give a judgment or opinion
example[3]: The scheme was pronounced a failure.
example[4]: He used to pronounce on matters he knew nothing about.
note[2]: pronounce sentence (=tell a court of law what punishment a criminal will have)
